rules.text: No incitement of violence or promotion of violent ideologies
Sexually explicit, overtly lewd, or violent media must be marked as sensitive when posting. Media depicting non-consensual sex is prohibited.
No loli/shota/etc lewds. If I even have to question their age there are no warnings. You're simply gone.
No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, ableism, casteism, or any other bigotry
No harassment, dogpiling or doxxing of other users anywhere in the fediverse
No content illegal in the US
Do not share intentionally false or misleading information
No advertisement or self-promotion accounts. Users may self-promote in moderation, but that should not be the sole purpose of the account.

Content Warnings must be used on posts discussing or describing common trauma-inducing topics including, but not limited to: sexual assault, domestic abuse, gore, and specific acts of violence or hatred

records.text: This week I spent a lot of my gaming time on Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden again. I am still so impressed by the sidequests in this game, as they are well written and feed into each other. Choices you make get integrated into how the world evolves and it's really great to see a B-game do this. Yes, it has some weaknesses in its combat, but that's fine by me.Also doing a lot of side content in it. While I'd normally skip it, I just want to spend more time in this world.AI: Somnium Files gets pretty much all of my portable time right now. It is an enjoyable VN that I will actually see through.#gaming #rpg #visualnovel

records.text: The finale was honestly a lot better than I expected.I suppose they could've included a scene at the end (after their graduation) with Mahiru and Kano being more intimate to deliver on the yuri. But honestly, leaving it as is also felt kind of natural?I also feel like even though there's a timeskip in-universe for the two of them to patch things up, as a viewer, their conflict was only just resolved. It would feel a bit forced if they were suddenly super close again.It's not as though Mahiru and Kano ever directly expressed romantic interest in each other.Then again, I'm aro, so what do I know about romance?#JellyfishCantSwimInTheNight

records.text: This week I spent a lot of my gaming time on Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden again. I am still so impressed by the sidequests in this game, as they are well written and feed into each other. Choices you make get integrated into how the world evolves and it's really great to see a B-game do this. Yes, it has some weaknesses in its combat, but that's fine by me.Also doing a lot of side content in it. While I'd normally skip it, I just want to spend more time in this world.AI: Somnium Files gets pretty much all of my portable time right now. It is an enjoyable VN that I will actually see through.#gaming #rpg #visualnovel

records.text: This week I spent a lot of my gaming time on Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden again. I am still so impressed by the sidequests in this game, as they are well written and feed into each other. Choices you make get integrated into how the world evolves and it's really great to see a B-game do this. Yes, it has some weaknesses in its combat, but that's fine by me.Also doing a lot of side content in it. While I'd normally skip it, I just want to spend more time in this world.AI: Somnium Files gets pretty much all of my portable time right now. It is an enjoyable VN that I will actually see through.#gaming #rpg #visualnovel

records.text: The finale was honestly a lot better than I expected.I suppose they could've included a scene at the end (after their graduation) with Mahiru and Kano being more intimate to deliver on the yuri. But honestly, leaving it as is also felt kind of natural?I also feel like even though there's a timeskip in-universe for the two of them to patch things up, as a viewer, their conflict was only just resolved. It would feel a bit forced if they were suddenly super close again.It's not as though Mahiru and Kano ever directly expressed romantic interest in each other.Then again, I'm aro, so what do I know about romance?#JellyfishCantSwimInTheNight

records.text: This week I spent a lot of my gaming time on Banishers: Ghosts of New Eden again. I am still so impressed by the sidequests in this game, as they are well written and feed into each other. Choices you make get integrated into how the world evolves and it's really great to see a B-game do this. Yes, it has some weaknesses in its combat, but that's fine by me.Also doing a lot of side content in it. While I'd normally skip it, I just want to spend more time in this world.AI: Somnium Files gets pretty much all of my portable time right now. It is an enjoyable VN that I will actually see through.#gaming #rpg #visualnovel
